title: Preoperative Comorbidities Associated With Weight Loss Following Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery: A Rapid Review.
abstract: This rapid review aims to summarize the evidence of weight loss following Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (MBS) associated with preoperative comorbidities. Electronic databases Medline and EMBASE were searched for relevant articles up to and including September 2023. Studies that reported associations between the presence of comorbidities and weight loss outcomes in adult patients (age ≥ 18 years) after MBS (with ≥ 6 months of follow-up). Standardized mean differences (SMDs) with 95% confidence intervals (95% CIs) were calculated and pooled using random effects meta-analysis.
